Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: JKM Oracle Consistent (Update Date)
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION This KM provides consistent journalization based on a Last_Update_Date column on the source tables. This column must be updated on the source table with the system date by any application inserting or updating rows. The KM will then detect the created and modified records based on the value of this date. Optionally, deletes will be detected thanks to a trigger that will be fired only on Delete statements. Because this KM does not rely on any capture mechanism to detect the changes, the source system performances are not degraded.
REQUIREMENTS - Required privilege on the connection user: DBA role - Required privilege on the work schema: SELECT ANY TABLE must be directly granted to the user (not via a role) - All the source tables must have a column maintaining the last update date. The name of this column must be identical for all the source columns. - The column storing the last update date must be indexed for better performances. - The column storing the last update date must be of one of the following data types: DATE or TIMESTAMP. - The column storing the last update date must be loaded with the system date of the RDBM (sysdate, systimestamp) and not with the system date of the client application. - All the source tables must have a primary key defined in the ODI repository.
BASIC CONFIGURATION 1. Configure Consistent CDC as described in the ODI documentation. 2. Set the UPDATE_DATE_COL_NAME option with the name of the column that stores the last update date. 3. Set the VALIDATE option to Yes. 4. Start Journalization. 5. Create a subscriber on the CDC Set. 6. Start consuming the changed data.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - UPDATE_DATE_COL_NAME(*): Name of the column on the source tables that stores the last update date. - ENABLE_CAPTURE_FOR_DELETE: Allows to deactivate the capture of Deletions for better performance. - NORMALIZED_TIMESTAMPS: Timestamps in normalized timezone - COMPATIBLE: Allows to optimize the generated code for a specific version of the database. - VALIDATE: Validates KM options. - ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT: Enable Support for Editioning Views - SUBSCRIBER_VISIBILITY_ON_ALL_EDS: Is a subscriber visible accross all editioning views?
LIMITATIONS Changed data might be captured multiple times because the capture needs to be restarted from the date of the last uncommitted transaction on source tables when the previous extend window was performed. This KM does not capture changes on the primary key values. When using this KM in a RAC environment, the system time of all the instances must be synchronized.
Name of the update date column

Enter the name of the column that holds the last update date.
This column must exist on any journalized table. Its data type must be either DATE or TIMESTAMP and should be indexed for better performance. It is the responsibility of all the applications that modify the source tables to maintain this column with the system date when the Update or the Insert took place. It must be set using sysdate or systimestamp in order to ensure consistency of the dates within the database. If the system date of the client application is used, there is a risk to lose some changes if both systems are not synchronized.
This option is mandatory.
Coordinated Universal Time formerly Greenwich Mean Time

Set this option to NO if you are not interested in capturing the Deletions on the source tables. This will improve the overall performances of the KM.
When this option is set to YES, a trigger is created on the source table and some extra steps are generated to compute consistency for deletes.

Set to yes this option if the LAST_UPDATE_DATE columns is set to a timestamp in the normalized timezone. In other words, if the LAST_UPDATE_DATE column is set to :
CAST(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE tz_offset(dbtimezone) AS TIMESTAMP)

This option affects the use of PURGE key word and the way statistics are collected:
Values PURGE STATS 10 Yes DBMS_STATS 9 No DBMS_STATS 8 No ANALYZE

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE - validation of RDBMS version of staging database
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

This option generates an extra validation step during development. The performed validations are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE - validation of RDBMS version of the database
This option should be turned off for all production use, in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.
This option must be set to False for generating WebServices.
Note : Execute this this grant as sys to modify the permissions of the target data server schema
grant select on v_$parameter to <user>;

In case you use this JKM in an Oracle DB 11R2 or later environment with Editions activated and data is accessed through editioning views instead of directly through tables, you should consider activating this option. Please see KM reference guide for details.
Is a subs visible accross all eds?

By default (=no) a subscriber is specific to a single edition. This means edition ED1 and ED2 can have a subscriber SUBS_A defined and all operations on SUBS_A in ED1 are independent of those in ED2. If activated, a subscriber is visible across all editions.

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){
/* No Editioning View Support */

%>

/* This table is created in the work physical schema set as default for the Data server */
create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>
(
	CDC_SET_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null,	/* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */
	CUR_WINDOW_ID	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last window Id that has been used */
	CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last Window Id used to compute delete consitency */
	CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last Window Id used to compute inert / update consitency */
	RETRIEVE_DATA	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null,	/* Command to execute in order to retrieve the journal data (used by the OdiRetrieveJournalData tool) */
	REFRESH_ROW_COUNT	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null,	/* Command to execute in order to refresh the row count(used by the OdiRefreshJournalData tool) */
	constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SET primary key (CDC_SET_NAME)
)

<% } else { 
/* Editioning View support enabled */
%>

DECLARE
	oldTableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	aeTableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	currentEdition	VARCHAR2(30);
	baseEdition	VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN
	-- Check, if CDC set ae table already exists
	select 	count('X') 
	into	aeTableExists
	from 	all_tables
	where 	owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
	and	table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2);

	IF aeTableExists = 0 THEN
		-- Create table
		execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE (' ||
		'	EDITION_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> default ''N/A'',	/* Name of Oracle Edition the CDC set is defined for */ ' ||
		'	CDC_SET_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null,	/* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */ ' ||
		'	CUR_WINDOW_ID	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last window Id that has been used */ ' ||
		'	CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last Window Id used to compute delete consitency */ ' ||
		'	CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null,	/* Last Window Id used to compute inert / update consitency */ ' ||
		'	RETRIEVE_DATA	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null,	/* Command to execute in order to retrieve the journal data (used by the OdiRetrieveJournalData tool) */ ' ||
		'	REFRESH_ROW_COUNT	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null,	/* Command to execute in order to refresh the row count(used by the OdiRefreshJournalData tool) */ ' ||
		'	constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SET primary key (EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME) ' ||
		')';
	END IF; 

	-- Create view returning only subscribers of current edition
	execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%> as ' ||
	'	select	EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME, CUR_WINDOW_ID, CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL, CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT' ||
	'	from	<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE' ||
	'	where	(EDITION_NAME =  sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'') or ' ||
	'		EDITION_NAME =  ''N/A'') ';

END;

<% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){ /* No Editioning View Support */
%>
/* This table is created in the work physical schema set as default for the Data server */ create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> ( CDC_SET_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255")%> not null, /* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */ FULL_TABLE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Complete name of the journalized table */ FULL_DATA_VIEW <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Complete name of the journalizing data view */ RETRIEVE_DATA <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to retrieve the journal data (used by the OdiRetrieveJournalData tool) */ REFRESH_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to refresh the row count (used by the OdiRefreshRowCount tool) */ CDC_LAST_DATE TIMESTAMP, CDC_CURRENT_DATE TIMESTAMP, constraint PK_SNP_CDC_TBL primary key (FULL_TABLE_NAME) )
<% } else { /* Editioning View support enabled */ %>
DECLARE aeTableExists NUMBER(1,0); oldTableExists NUMBER(1,0); extraColsExist NUMBER(1,0); currentEdition VARCHAR2(30); baseEdition VARCHAR2(30); BEGIN -- Check, if CDC table list AE table already exists select count('X') into aeTableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>_AE', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2);
-- Check for columns CDC_LAST_DATE DATE and CDC_CURRENT_DATE DATE select count('X') into extraColsExist from all_tab_cols where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2) and column_name = 'CDC_LAST_DATE';
IF oldTableExists > 0 THEN IF extraColsExist = 0 THEN -- Add columns for Update-Date-CDC execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> add (CDC_LAST_DATE TIMESTAMP, CDC_CURRENT_DATE TIMESTAMP)'; END IF;
ELSIF aeTableExists = 0 THEN -- Create table execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>_AE (' || ' EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> default ''N/A'', /* Name of Oracle Edition the CDC set is defined for */ ' || ' CDC_SET_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255")%> not null, /* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */' || ' FULL_TABLE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Complete name of the journalized table */' || ' FULL_DATA_VIEW <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null, /* Complete name of the journalizing data view */' || ' RETRIEVE_DATA <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to retrieve the journal data (used by the OdiRetrieveJournalData tool) */' || ' REFRESH_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, /* Command to execute to refresh the row count (used by the OdiRefreshRowCount tool) */' || ' CDC_LAST_DATE TIMESTAMP,' || ' CDC_CURRENT_DATE TIMESTAMP,' || ' constraint PK_SNP_CDC_TBL primary key (EDITION_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME)' || ')'; END IF;
-- Create view returning only subscribers of current edition execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%> as ' || ' select EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, FULL_DATA_VIEW, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT, ' || ' CDC_LAST_DATE, CDC_CURRENT_DATE' || ' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>_AE' || ' where (EDITION_NAME = sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'') or ' || ' EDITION_NAME = ''N/A'') ';
END;
<% }; %>
Add columns to table list table

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){
/* No Editioning View Support */ %>

alter table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> add
(
	CDC_LAST_DATE	TIMESTAMP,
	CDC_CURRENT_DATE	TIMESTAMP
)

<% } else 
/* Editioning View Support */ { %>

-- already updated in step "*Create table list table"
<% }; %>

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_TYPE, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME, case when upper (OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE) = 'TABLE' then 'PURGE' else ' ' end <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DROP_OPTION from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE in ('TRIGGER', 'VIEW', 'TABLE')

insCmd = """ insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%> ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>EDITION_NAME, <%};%>CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER, CDC_REFDATE, MIN_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL, MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC_ROW_COUNT ) select <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>/* EDITION_NAME */ sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name'), <%};%>/* CDC_SET_NAME */ '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>', /* CDC_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* CDC_REFDATE */ sysdate, /* MIN_WINDOW_ID */ CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID */ -1, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL */ -1, /* MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS */ -1, /* CDC_ROW_COUNT */ 0 from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>and CDC.EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') <%};%> """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDC.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { 

/* No edition support needed */
%>
drop trigger <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_TRIGGER")%>
<% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")) {
/* Edition support needed */ %>
getEdNamesQuery = """ -- Get current edition and highest usable edition select sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') CURRENT_EDITION, EDITION_NAME BASE_EDITION from ( select LEVEL L, EDITION_NAME, min(case when USABLE='YES' then LEVEL else 999999 end) over (partition by 1) MIN_LEVEL from all_editions start with PARENT_EDITION_NAME IS NULL connect by prior EDITION_NAME = PARENT_EDITION_NAME ) where L = MIN_LEVEL """
changeEditionCmd = """ alter session set edition = %s """
getJrnBaseTableNameQuery = """ select OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME table_name from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and VIEW_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2) """
viewExistsQuery = """ -- Count views based on this editions journal table select count('X') C from all_editioning_views_ae where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2) and table_name = ( -- Get GUID table name select table_name from all_editioning_views where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2) ) """
dropTriggerCmd = """ drop trigger %s """
# Get edition names myStmt = myCon.createStatement() rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getEdNamesQuery) rs.next() currentEdition = rs.getString("CURRENT_EDITION") baseEdition = rs.getString("BASE_EDITION") rs.close() rs = None
# Get journal table name rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getJrnBaseTableNameQuery) rs.next() schemaName = "<%=odiRef.getObjectName("")%>" # replace ".J$_" by ".T$_": triggerName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME").replace( "<?=odiRef.getObjectName("%JRN_PRF_TAB")?>"[len(schemaName)-1:], "<?=odiRef.getObjectName("%JRN_PRF_TRG")?>"[len(schemaName)-1:] ) rs.close() rs = None
# How many views still use this journal table? rs = myStmt.executeQuery(viewExistsQuery) rs.next() viewExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None
# Switch to baseEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (baseEdition))
# Drop trigger if viewExists == 1: # Only one view left... # we drop can drop the trigger on the underlying table myStmt.executeQuery(dropTriggerCmd % triggerName)
# Switch back to currentEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (currentEdition))
# Commit, just in case myCon.commit()
myStmt.close() myStmt = None
<% }; %>

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> compute statistics
<% } else { %>
begin dbms_stats.gather_table_stats( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema( "W" )%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll(odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema(\\u0022W\\u0022)+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%>', estimate_percent => dbms_stats.auto_sample_size ); end;
<%}; %>
delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'

/* Mandatory to prevent OdiRetrieveData or other Extend window in parallel */
<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){%>
update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC set CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID = CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID + 2, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS = CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID + 1, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL = CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID + 2 where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'
<% } else { %>
update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC set (CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL) = (select max(CUR_WINDOW_ID) + 2, max(CUR_WINDOW_ID) + 1, max(CUR_WINDOW_ID) + 2 from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' ) where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'
<% }; %>

update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%><% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>_AE<%};%> set CDC_CURRENT_DATE = ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("NORMALIZED_TIMESTAMPS").equals("1")){%>select CAST(cur_time AT TIME ZONE tz_offset(dbtimezone) AS TIMESTAMP) from (<%};%> select nvl(min(SCN_TO_TIMESTAMP(TR.start_scnb)),SYSTIMESTAMP-6/86400) cur_time from gv$transaction TR, gv$session SE, gv$lock LK, all_objects OB where TR.addr = SE.taddr and SE.sid = LK.sid and LK.id1 = OB.object_id and OB.owner || '.' || OB.object_name = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'<% if (odiRef.getOption("NORMALIZED_TIMESTAMPS").equals("1")){%>)<%};%> ) where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'

/* Compute Window Id for each table of the CDC Set from children to parents */ /* This computes consistency regarding Inserts and Updates */ /* Since there are no triggers, the J$ table is populated by the extend window step... */ insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( WINDOW_ID, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%> ) select /* WINDOW_ID */ CDCSET.CUR_WINDOW_ID + 1, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG, ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){%> -- Get current window id select CUR_WINDOW_ID from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE" )%> where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <% } else { %> -- Get max cur_window_id across all editions for this CDC set select max(CUR_WINDOW_ID) CUR_WINDOW_ID from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <% }; %> ) <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDCSET, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> CDCTAB where TARG.<%=odiRef.getOption("UPDATE_DATE_COL_NAME")%> >= CDCTAB.CDC_LAST_DATE and CDCTAB.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDCTAB.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'

/* Compute Window Id for each table of the CDC Set from parents to children */ /* This computes consistency regarding Deletes */ update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN set JRN.WINDOW_ID = ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){%> select CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL + 2 from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <% } else { %> -- Get maximum window_id across all editions for this cdc set select max(CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL) + 2 from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%>_AE <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <%};%> ) where JRN.WINDOW_ID is null

update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> set CDC_LAST_DATE = CDC_CURRENT_DATE where CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'

updCmd = """ update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS set ( SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID, SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS, SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL ) = ( select CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, CDC.CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' ) where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and SUBS.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the update prepUpdStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(updCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepUpdStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepUpdStmt.executeUpdate()
prepUpdStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> estimate statistics
<% } else { %>
begin dbms_stats.gather_table_stats( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema( "W" )%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll(odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema(\\u0022W\\u0022)+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%>', estimate_percent => dbms_stats.auto_sample_size ); end;
<%};%>

/* This query returns a row for each journalizing trigger, view or table if the table is no longer a part of the CDC Set */ select OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_TYPE, OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DB_OBJECT_NAME, case when upper (OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE) = 'TABLE' then 'PURGE' else '' end <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> DROP_OPTION from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and OBJ.DB_OBJECT_TYPE in ('TRIGGER', 'VIEW', 'TABLE') and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME )

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) {
/* No edition support needed */ %> /* This command is sent to the database only if the table is not already a part of the set */ /* If you want this command to be always executed, remove the query on the source tab */ create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> /* This table is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ ( WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", "", "PK")%> )
<% } else { /* Edition support needed */ %> declare viewExists NUMBER(3,0); pkColsMatch NUMBER(1,0); vEVDef VARCHAR2(32767); vEVColName VARCHAR2(100); vTableColName VARCHAR2(100); vDataType VARCHAR2(100); baseTableName VARCHAR2(100); cursor cEVPKCols is select VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, DATATYPE from ( -- if the journalized object is an EV... select VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, VIEW_COLUMN_ID, case <%=odiRef.getColList("", "when VIEW_COLUMN_NAME = '[COL_NAME]' then '[DEST_WRI_DT] null'", "\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> end DATATYPE from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEW_COLS_AE where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and VIEW_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') and VIEW_COLUMN_NAME in (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "'[COL_NAME]'", ", ", "", "PK")%>)
union all
-- if the journalized object is NOT an EV... select COLUMN_NAME VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_NAME TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_ID VIEW_COLUMN_ID, case <%=odiRef.getColList("", "when COLUMN_NAME = '[COL_NAME]' then '[DEST_WRI_DT] null'", "\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> end DATATYPE from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS ac, ALL_TABLES at where ac.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and ac.TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and COLUMN_NAME in (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "'[COL_NAME]'", ", ", "", "PK")%>) -- Join to ALL_TABLE needed to prevent dublicate rows, -- as EV columns are listed in ALL_TAB_COLUMNS, but EVs are not listed in ALL_TABLES and at.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and at.TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and at.OWNER = ac.OWNER and at.TABLE_NAME = ac.TABLE_NAME ) order by VIEW_COLUMN_ID ; begin -- Check whether there is already a view -- This means that there is already a GUID-based journal table available select count(*) into viewExists from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and VIEW_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- If this is the first edition, we want to journalize this table,... if viewExists = 0 then -- we want to create the journal table
-- First we build the mapping from ev cols to table cols vEVDef := ''; open cEVPKCols; loop fetch cEVPKCols into vEVColName, vTableColName, vDataType; exit when cEVPKCols%NOTFOUND; vEVDef := vEVDef || ', ' || vTableColName || ' ' || vDataType; end loop; close cEVPKCols;
-- Generate a GUID base table name <? String tableName = java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase().replace('-','_'); ?> baseTableName := '<?=odiRef.getObjectName("L","%JRN_PRF_TAB"+tableName, "W")?>';
execute immediate 'create table '|| baseTableName ||' '|| '('|| ' WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null,'|| substr(vEVDef, 2)|| ')'; else -- as the journal table already exists, we need to reuse it -- Let's find out the name of the base table select TABLE_NAME into baseTableName from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and VIEW_NAME ='<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_NAME")%>' and ROWNUM = 1;
-- Check that the new PK matches the existing journal table -- We need to consider table column name -> ev column name translation begin with new_pk_cols as ( -- if the journalized object is an EV... -- we need to translate ODI PK definition into J$ col names select tc.column_name as PK_COLNAME from all_tab_cols tc, all_editioning_view_cols evc where 1=1 and tc.owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and tc.table_name = ( select table_name from all_editioning_views where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2)) and evc.owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and evc.view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and tc.column_name = evc.table_column_name and evc.view_column_name in (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "'[COL_NAME]'", ", ", "", "PK")%>)
union all
-- if the journalized object is NOT an EV... -- we can take ODI column names, no translation required select PK_COLNAME from <%=odiRef.getColList("(", "select '[COL_NAME]' as PK_COLNAME from dual", "union all \n\t\t\t\t", ")", "PK")%> where not exists ( -- make sure this is a table and not an EV select 'X' from all_editioning_views ev where 1=1 and ev.owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and ev.view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) ) ), installed_pk_cols as ( select tc.column_name as PK_COLNAME from all_tab_cols tc where 1=1 and tc.owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>' and tc.table_name = baseTableName -- Remove all non-PK columns and tc.column_name not in ('WINDOW_ID') ) select 1 into pkColsMatch from dual where -- new pk and installed pk have same number of columns? (select count('X') from new_pk_cols) = (select count('X') from installed_pk_cols) and -- columns of new pk and installed pk are the same? (select count('X') from new_pk_cols) = (select count('X') from ( select pk_colname from new_pk_cols union select pk_colname from installed_pk_cols) ); exception when NO_DATA_FOUND then raise_application_error(-20002, 'ODIKM-ORA-JKM-10008: New PK definition does not match columns of existing journal table '||baseTableName||'!'); end; end if;
-- Now we need to create the journal EV...
-- First we build the mapping from ev cols to table cols vEVDef := ''; open cEVPKCols; loop fetch cEVPKCols into vEVColName, vTableColName, vDataType; exit when cEVPKCols%NOTFOUND; vEVDef := vEVDef || ', ' || vTableColName || ' as ' || vEVColName; end loop; close cEVPKCols;
-- Now we can create the EV vEVDef := 'create or replace editioning view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> as'|| ' select window_id, '|| substr(vEVDef, 2) || ' from ' || baseTableName; execute immediate vEVDef;
end; <%};%>

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )
Register J$ Table in CDC Objects

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_NAME' )

create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, /* For V3 compatibility */ JRN.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, /* Renamed for V3 compatibility */ <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from (select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]", ",	", "", "PK")%>,SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER, SUB.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS, max(JRN.WINDOW_ID) WINDOW_ID from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUB where SUB.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and JRN.WINDOW_ID > SUB.MIN_WINDOW_ID and JRN.WINDOW_ID <= SUB.MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL group by <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]", ",	", "", "PK")%>,SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER, SUB.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS) JRN, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	= TARG.[COL_NAME] (+)", "
and	", "", "PK")%> and not ( TARG.ROWID is not null and JRN.WINDOW_ID > JRN.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS )

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_VIEW' )

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { 

/* No edition support needed */
%>
drop table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() >= 10 ) { out.print( "purge" ); }; %>

<% } else { 

/* Edition support needed */
%>
declare
	viewExists	NUMBER(3,0);
	baseTableName	VARCHAR2(100 CHAR);
begin
	-- Count the number of journal views defined
	select 	count('X') 
	into	viewExists
	from 	all_views_ae 
	where 	owner || '.' || view_name = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>';
	
	-- If this is the last EV defined...
	if viewExists = 1 then
		-- we drop can also drop the underlying table
		begin
			select	OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME
			into 	baseTableName
			from 	ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE
			where	OWNER||'.'||VIEW_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>'
			and	EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name');

			execute immediate 'drop table '|| baseTableName ||' purge';
		exception
			when NO_DATA_FOUND
			then raise_application_error(-20101, 'ODIKM-ORA-JKM-10009: Editioning view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> not defined. No drop required.');
		end;
	end if;

	-- If the journal EV exists...
	if viewExists > 0 then
		-- we drop it
		execute immediate 'drop view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%>';
	end if;	
end;
<% }; %>
Delete table from CDC Objects table

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){
/* No Editioning View Support */

%>

/* This table is created in the work physical schema set as default for the Data server */
create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%>
(
	FULL_TABLE_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null,	/* Complete name of the journalized table */
	CDC_OBJECT_TYPE	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> not null,	/* Type of the object in the CDC framework */
	FULL_OBJECT_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null,	/* Complete name of the object */
	DB_OBJECT_TYPE	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> null,	/* RDBMS type of the object (ex : TABLE, VIEW, TRIGGER) */
	constraint PK_SNP_CDC_OBJ primary key (FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE)
)

<% } else { 
/* Editioning View support enabled */
%>

DECLARE
	aeTableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	oldTableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	currentEdition	VARCHAR2(30);
	baseEdition	VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN
	-- Check, if CDC table list ae table already exists
	select 	count('X') 
	into	aeTableExists
	from 	all_tables
	where 	owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
	and	table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>_AE', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2);

	IF aeTableExists = 0 THEN
		-- Create table
		execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>_AE (' ||
		'	EDITION_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> default ''N/A'',	/* Name of Oracle Edition the CDC set is defined for */ ' ||
		'	FULL_TABLE_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null,	/* Complete name of the journalized table */ ' ||
		'	CDC_OBJECT_TYPE	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> not null,	/* Type of the object in the CDC framework */ ' ||
		'	FULL_OBJECT_NAME	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "255")%> not null,	/* Complete name of the object */ ' ||
		'	DB_OBJECT_TYPE	<%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> null,	/* RDBMS type of the object (ex : TABLE, VIEW, TRIGGER) */ ' ||
		'	constraint PK_SNP_CDC_OBJ primary key (EDITION_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE) ' ||
		')';
	END IF;

	-- Create view returning only subscribers of current edition
	execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%> as ' ||
	'	select	EDITION_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME, DB_OBJECT_TYPE' ||
	'	from	<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>_AE' ||
	'	where	(EDITION_NAME =  sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'') or ' ||
	'		EDITION_NAME =  ''N/A'') ';

END;

<% }; %>

insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%> ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%> EDITION_NAME, <%};%> CDC_SET_NAME, CUR_WINDOW_ID, CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL, CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT ) values ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%> /* EDITION_NAME */ sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name'), <%};%> /* CDC_SET_NAME */ '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>', /* CUR_WINDOW_ID */ -1, /* CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL */ -1, /* CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS */ -1, /* RETRIEVE_DATA */ NULL, /* REFRESH_ROW_COUNT */ 'update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> set CDC_ROW_COUNT = 0 ' || 'where CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' ' || 'and CDC_SET_NAME = ''<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'' ' <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%> ||' and EDITION_NAME=''' || sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') || ''''<%};%> )

update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SET_TABLE")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC set CDC.RETRIEVE_DATA = NULL, CDC.REFRESH_ROW_COUNT = 'update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> set CDC_ROW_COUNT = 0 ' || 'where CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' ' || 'and CDC_SET_NAME = ''<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'' ' <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%> ||' and EDITION_NAME=''' || sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') || ''''<%};%> where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>and CDC.EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') <%};%>

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_VIEW' )

updCmd = """ update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS set SUBS.MIN_WINDOW_ID = SUBS.MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and SUBS.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the update prepUpdStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(updCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepUpdStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepUpdStmt.executeUpdate()
prepUpdStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()
Register data view in CDC Objects

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW' )

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) {
/* No edition support needed */ %>
triggerCmd = """ create or replace trigger <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_TRIGGER")%> after delete on <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for each row declare <%=odiRef.getColList("", "V_[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_CRE_DT];", "\n\t", "", "PK")%> begin <%=odiRef.getColList("", "V_[COL_NAME] := :old.[COL_NAME];", "\n\t\t", "", "PK")%>
insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( WINDOW_ID, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) values ( /* WINDOW_ID */ NULL, <%=odiRef.getColList("", ":old.[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> ); end; """
# Create the statement myStmt = myCon.createStatement()
# Execute the trigger creation myStmt.execute(triggerCmd)
myStmt.close() myStmt = None
# Commit, just in case myCon.commit()
<% } else {
/* Edition support needed */ %>
# Install views into base edition for backwards compatibility # Note: backwards compatibility views may only be installed, if they do not exist, yet. Otherwise edition heritage chain will be damaged.
getEdNamesQuery = """ -- Get current edition and highest usable edition select sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') CURRENT_EDITION, EDITION_NAME BASE_EDITION from ( select LEVEL L, EDITION_NAME, min(case when USABLE='YES' then LEVEL else 999999 end) over (partition by 1) MIN_LEVEL from all_editions start with PARENT_EDITION_NAME IS NULL connect by prior EDITION_NAME = PARENT_EDITION_NAME ) where L = MIN_LEVEL """
changeEditionCmd = """ alter session set edition = %s """
getBaseTableNameQuery = """ -- In case the data store is a table... select owner||'.'||table_name table_name from all_tables where owner like '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "FULL_TABLE_NAME" )%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2)
union
-- In case the data store is a view... select owner||'.'||table_name table_name from all_editioning_views where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "FULL_TABLE_NAME" )%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) """
getJournalBaseTableNameQuery = """ select owner||'.'||table_name table_name from all_editioning_views where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_FULL_NAME" )%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2) """
getPKColsQuery = """ select VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, DATATYPE from ( -- if the journalized object is an EV... select VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, VIEW_COLUMN_ID, case <%=odiRef.getColList("", "when VIEW_COLUMN_NAME = '[COL_NAME]' then '[DEST_WRI_DT] null'", "\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> end DATATYPE from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEW_COLS_AE where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and VIEW_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') and VIEW_COLUMN_NAME in (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "'[COL_NAME]'", ", ", "", "PK")%>)
union all
-- if the journalized object is NOT an EV... select COLUMN_NAME VIEW_COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_NAME TABLE_COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_ID VIEW_COLUMN_ID, case <%=odiRef.getColList("", "when COLUMN_NAME = '[COL_NAME]' then '[DEST_WRI_DT] null'", "\n\t\t", "", "PK")%> end DATATYPE from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS ac, ALL_TABLES at where ac.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and ac.TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and COLUMN_NAME in (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "'[COL_NAME]'", ", ", "", "PK")%>) -- Join to ALL_TABLE needed to prevent dublicate rows, -- as EV columns are listed in ALL_TAB_COLUMNS, but EVs are not listed in ALL_TABLES and at.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>' and at.TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("D")%>')+2) and at.OWNER = ac.OWNER and at.TABLE_NAME = ac.TABLE_NAME ) order by VIEW_COLUMN_ID """
installTriggerCmd = """ create or replace trigger %(trigger_name)s after delete on %(object_name)s for each row declare %(declare_cols)s begin %(set_cols)s
insert into %(journal_table)s ( WINDOW_ID, %(pk_cols)s ) values ( /* WINDOW_ID */ NULL, %(pk_col_values)s ); end; """
# Get base table name myStmt = myCon.createStatement() rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getBaseTableNameQuery) rs.next() baseTableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME") rs.close() rs = None
# Get journal base table name rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getJournalBaseTableNameQuery) rs.next() jrnBaseTableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME") rs.close() rs = None
# Get edition names rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getEdNamesQuery) rs.next() currentEdition = rs.getString("CURRENT_EDITION") baseEdition = rs.getString("BASE_EDITION") rs.close() rs = None
# Build expressions based on PK columns declare_cols = "" set_cols = "" pk_cols = "" pk_col_values = "" rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getPKColsQuery) while (rs.next()): viewColName = rs.getString("VIEW_COLUMN_NAME") tableColName = rs.getString("TABLE_COLUMN_NAME") dataType = rs.getString("DATATYPE") declare_cols += "V_%s %s; " % (tableColName, dataType) set_cols += "V_%s := :old.%s; " % (tableColName, tableColName) pk_cols += ",%s " % (tableColName) pk_col_values += ",:old.%s " % (tableColName) rs.close() rs = None pk_cols = pk_cols[1:] pk_col_values = pk_col_values[1:]
# Switch to baseEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (baseEdition))
# Get J$ and T$ prefix schemaName = "<%=odiRef.getObjectName("")%>" # to replace ".J$_" by ".T$_": jrnPrefix = "<?=odiRef.getObjectName("%JRN_PRF_TAB")?>"[len(schemaName)-1:] triggerPrefix = "<?=odiRef.getObjectName("%JRN_PRF_TRG")?>"[len(schemaName)-1:]
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Install delete trigger on base table myStmt.execute( installTriggerCmd % {"trigger_name": jrnBaseTableName.replace(jrnPrefix, triggerPrefix), "object_name": baseTableName, "journal_table": jrnBaseTableName, "declare_cols": declare_cols, "set_cols": set_cols, "pk_cols": pk_cols, "pk_col_values": pk_col_values } )
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Switch back to currentEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (currentEdition))
# Commit, just in case myCon.commit()
myStmt.close() myStmt = None
<% }; %>

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_TRIGGER")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_TRIGGER' )

select FULL_TABLE_NAME <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") %> FULL_TABLE_NAME from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L" ,"SNP_TMP_TABLE_LIST" , "W")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD") %> TMP where TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> OBJ, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TBL where TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = OBJ.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.FULL_TABLE_NAME = TMP.FULL_TABLE_NAME and TBL.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and OBJ.FULL_OBJECT_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_TRIGGER")%>' and OBJ.CDC_OBJECT_TYPE = 'JRN_FULL_TRIGGER' )

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDC.CDC_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' and CDC.FULL_TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>'
delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> CDC where CDC.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'

insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_TABLE_TABLE")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%> ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>EDITION_NAME, <%};%>CDC_SET_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, FULL_DATA_VIEW, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT, CDC_LAST_DATE, CDC_CURRENT_DATE ) values ( <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")){%>/* EDITION_NAME */ sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name'), <%};%>/* CDC_SET_NAME */ '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>', /* FULL_TABLE_NAME */ '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* FULL_DATA_VIEW */ '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%>', /* RETRIEVE_DATA */ NULL, /* REFRESH_ROW_COUNT */ 'update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%> SUBS set SUBS.CDC_ROW_COUNT = (select SUBS.CDC_ROW_COUNT + count(*) from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%> where JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'') where CDC_SET_NAME = ''<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>'' and CDC_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$''', sysdate, sysdate )

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= odiRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>

# Install views into base edition for backwards compatibility # Note: backwards compatibility views may only be installed, if they do not exist, yet. Otherwise edition heritage chain will be damaged.
getEdNamesQuery = """ -- Get current edition and highest usable edition select sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') CURRENT_EDITION, EDITION_NAME BASE_EDITION from ( select LEVEL L, EDITION_NAME, min(case when USABLE='YES' then LEVEL else 999999 end) over (partition by 1) MIN_LEVEL from all_editions start with PARENT_EDITION_NAME IS NULL connect by prior EDITION_NAME = PARENT_EDITION_NAME ) where L = MIN_LEVEL """
changeEditionCmd = """ alter session set edition = %s """
viewExistsQuery = """ -- Check whether view already exists select count('X') C from all_views_ae where owner = '%(owner)s' and view_name = substr('%(view)s', length('%(owner)s')+2) and edition_name = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name') """
tableExistsQuery = """ -- Check whether view already exists select count('X') C from all_tables where owner = '%(owner)s' and table_name = substr('%(table)s', length('%(owner)s')+2) """
upgradeTableCmd01 = """alter table %s add EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "30", "0" )%> default 'N/A' """ upgradeTableCmd02 = """alter table %s drop constraint %s """ upgradeTableCmd03 = """alter table %s add constraint %s primary key (%s) """ upgradeTableCmd04 = """alter table %s rename to %s"""
createViewCDCSubscriberCmd = """ create or replace force view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%> as select CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER, CDC_REFDATE, MIN_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL, MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>_AE where EDITION_NAME = 'N/A' """
createViewCDCSetCmd = """ create or replace force view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%> as select CDC_SET_NAME, CUR_WINDOW_ID, CUR_WINDOW_ID_DEL, CUR_WINDOW_ID_INS, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE where EDITION_NAME = 'N/A' """
createViewCDCTableCmd = """ create or replace force view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%> as select CDC_SET_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, FULL_DATA_VIEW, RETRIEVE_DATA, REFRESH_ROW_COUNT, CDC_LAST_DATE, CDC_CURRENT_DATE from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>_AE where EDITION_NAME = 'N/A' """
createViewCDCObjectCmd = """ create or replace force view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%> as select FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE, FULL_OBJECT_NAME, DB_OBJECT_TYPE from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>_AE where EDITION_NAME = 'N/A' """
# Get edition names myStmt = myCon.createStatement() rs = myStmt.executeQuery(getEdNamesQuery) rs.next() currentEdition = rs.getString("CURRENT_EDITION") baseEdition = rs.getString("BASE_EDITION") rs.close() rs = None
# Switch to baseEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (baseEdition))
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Upgrade CDC Subscriber table rs = myStmt.executeQuery(tableExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "table":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() tableExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if tableExists == 1: # Upgrade existing subscriber table to _AE table myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd01 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>""") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd02 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_SBS") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd03 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_SBS", "EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd04 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>""", "<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>_AE"[len("<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>")+1:]) )
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Install CDC Subscriber view for backwards compatibility rs = myStmt.executeQuery(viewExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "view":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() viewExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if viewExists == 0: myStmt.execute(createViewCDCSubscriberCmd)
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Upgrade CDC Set table rs = myStmt.executeQuery(tableExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "table":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() tableExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if tableExists == 1: # Upgrade existing subscriber table to _AE table myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd01 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>""") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd02 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_SET") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd03 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_SET", "EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd04 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>""", "<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>_AE"[len("<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>")+1:]) )
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Install CDC Set view for backwards compatibility rs = myStmt.executeQuery(viewExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "view":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SET_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() viewExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if viewExists == 0: myStmt.execute(createViewCDCSetCmd)
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Upgrade CDC Table table rs = myStmt.executeQuery(tableExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "table":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() tableExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if tableExists == 1: # Upgrade existing subscriber table to _AE table myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd01 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>""") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd02 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_TBL") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd03 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_TBL", "EDITION_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd04 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>""", "<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>_AE"[len("<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>")+1:]) )
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Install CDC Table view for backwards compatibility rs = myStmt.executeQuery(viewExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "view":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_TABLE_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() viewExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if viewExists == 0: myStmt.execute(createViewCDCTableCmd)
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Upgrade CDC Table table rs = myStmt.executeQuery(tableExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "table":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() tableExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if tableExists == 1: # Upgrade existing subscriber table to _AE table myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd01 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>""") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd02 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_OBJ") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd03 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>""", "PK_SNP_CDC_OBJ", "EDITION_NAME, FULL_TABLE_NAME, CDC_OBJECT_TYPE") ) myStmt.execute(upgradeTableCmd04 %("""<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>""", "<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>_AE"[len("<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>")+1:]) )
#--------------------------------------------------------------- # Install CDC Object view for backwards compatibility rs = myStmt.executeQuery(viewExistsQuery % {"owner":"<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>", "view":"<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_OBJECTS_TABLE" )%>"}) rs.next() viewExists = rs.getInt("C") rs.close() rs = None if viewExists == 0: myStmt.execute(createViewCDCObjectCmd)
# Switch back to currentEdition myStmt.execute(changeEditionCmd % (currentEdition))
# Commit, just in case myCon.commit()
myStmt.close() myStmt = None

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){ /* No Editioning View Support */
%>
/* This table is created in the work physical schema set as default for the Data server */ create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%> ( CDC_SET_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null, /* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */ CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "400", "0" )%> not null, /* Name of the subscriber who subscribed to the CDC Set */ CDC_REFDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> not null, /* Last update of the record */ MIN_WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Window Ids under this one should be ignored */ MAX_WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id used by this subscription */ MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id to take into consideration when looking at consistency for deletes */ MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id to take into consideration when looking at consistency for inserts / updates */ CDC_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10")%> not null, /* Number of rows in the journalizing tables for this subscription */ constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SBS primary key (CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER) )
<% } else { /* Editioning View support enabled */ %>
DECLARE aeTableExists NUMBER(1,0); oldTableExists NUMBER(1,0); currentEdition VARCHAR2(30); baseEdition VARCHAR2(30); BEGIN -- Check, if subscriber ae table already exists select count('X') into aeTableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>_AE', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>')+2);
IF aeTableExists = 0 THEN -- Create table execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>_AE (' || ' EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> default ''N/A'', /* Name of Oracle Edition the CDC set is defined for */ ' || ' CDC_SET_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "255", "0" )%> not null, /* Name of the CDC Set (ODI model code following the Local Mask syntax) */ ' || ' CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "400", "0" )%> not null, /* Name of the subscriber who subscribed to the CDC Set */ ' || ' CDC_REFDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> not null, /* Last update of the record */ ' || ' MIN_WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Window Ids under this one should be ignored */ ' || ' MAX_WINDOW_ID <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id used by this subscription */ ' || ' MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id to take into consideration when looking at consistency for deletes */ ' || ' MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> not null, /* Maximum Window Id to take into consideration when looking at consistency for inserts / updates */ ' || ' CDC_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10")%> not null, /* Number of rows in the journalizing tables for this subscription */ ' || ' constraint PK_SNP_CDC_SBS primary key (EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER) ' || ')'; END IF;
-- Create view returning only subscribers of current edition execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%> as ' || ' select EDITION_NAME, CDC_SET_NAME, CDC_SUBSCRIBER, CDC_REFDATE, MIN_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID, MAX_WINDOW_ID_DEL, MAX_WINDOW_ID_INS' || ' from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo( "CDC_SUBS_TABLE" )%>_AE' || ' where (EDITION_NAME = sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'') or ' || ' EDITION_NAME = ''N/A'') ';
END;
<% }; %>

/* Delete rows from journalizing tables that are useless for each subscriber */ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.WINDOW_ID <= ( select min(SUBS.MIN_WINDOW_ID) from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("CDC_SUBS_TABLE")%><%=(odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1"))?"_AE":""%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.CDC_SET_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_COD_MOD"), "D")%>' )

create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, sysdate <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, /* For V3 compatibility */ SUB.CDC_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, /* Renamed for V3 compatibility */ <%=odiRef.getColList("", "PKS.[COL_NAME]	" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
